Republican senator wants to hike tariffs on Chinese vehiclesRepublican Senator Josh Hawley is introducing on Wednesday legislation to hike tariffs on Chinese vehicle imports amid growing concerns about the impact of these vehicles on U.S. car companies. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 12:06:24 GMT YAIMPVUBLBBIERKOWCNNYK343HI https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/republican-senator-wants-hike-tariffs-chinese-vehicles-2024-02-28/David Shepardson商业汽车与交通
China's Premier Li urges stronger economic, trade ties with USChina and the United States should strengthen economic and trade ties and Washington should avoid decoupling from China, Chinese Premier Li Qiang said on Wednesday, during a meeting with a visiting U.S. delegation, Chinese state radio reported. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 11:36:50 GMT ZU6WLQL5JJPZPJCGVCIP7GUKN4 https://www.reuters.com/business/chinas-premier-li-urges-stronger-economic-trade-ties-with-us-2024-02-28/Reuters商业

Volkswagen says Changan Auto former chief software architect to be new Cariad China CEOVolkswagen said on Wednesday that Frank Han, the former chief software architect of Changan Auto, will take over as chief executive of its Cariad China unit on March 1. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 11:01:50 GMT KG2QWDS3KRKIXH47PHPMJUEXWM https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/volkswagen-says-changan-auto-former-chief-software-architect-be-new-cariad-china-2024-02-28/Reuters可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
Biden to crack down on US data flows to China, RussiaPresident Joe Biden's administration on Wednesday unveiled an executive order aimed at protecting American personal data by restricting its transfer to China, Russia and other countries, senior U.S. officials said, citing national security concerns. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 10:02:33 GMT BQOWBX5OQRNWJHYKGKJL2KXXZM https://www.reuters.com/technology/biden-crack-down-us-data-flows-china-Russia-2024-02-28/Alexandra Alper, Kanishka Singh技术网络安全
Australian politician 'sold out' country to foreign spy ring, says intelligence chiefA former politician "sold out" Australia to a foreign intelligence service, the country's spy chief said on Wednesday, adding that his agency had confronted the spy ring to let them know their cover had been blown. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 09:13:23 GMT B6LZ64I2HFLNRKG543KXQED2TI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australia-intelligence-chief-reveals-details-foreign-spy-operation-2024-02-28/Kirsty Needham世界亚太地区
